# Spoonacular API Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how spoonacular ("we", "our", or "us") collects,
uses, and shares information obtained through the spoonacular API ("the API").
**User-Provided Information:** When you subscribe to our API, you may choose to provide your email address for the purpose of creating your account.
**API-Collected Information:** We collect usage information based on your API key, such as which endpoints are used and which parameters are set.

## How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

  1.

When you subscribe to a paid API plan, your
payment information will be collected and processed by Stripe in accordance
with their [Privacy Policy](https://stripe.com/en-de/privacy).

## Data Security

We take commercially reasonable security measures to protect any information
collected from you.

# Spoonacular API Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how spoonacular ("we", "our", or "us") collects,
uses, and shares information obtained through the spoonacular API ("the API").

To track API usage to compute overage fees and for other billing purposes

## Information Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to outside
parties.

We may share your information with trusted third parties who assist
us in operating our API and servicing you as an API subscriber, as long as
those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
